column3: Latest;Sihanoukville â€“ Areas of Sihanoukville have once again been flooded following torrential rain that fell across the southern provinces on the night of September 14
column4: 2019.------More information to follow.------UPDATE: Electricity has been cut in some affected areas to avoid damage and injury. There are reports of damage to roads and property
column5: but no casualties as yet. ------MORE PHOTOS------ (Photos: Huy Bunleng)
